Address.Address1: KUCUK AYASOFYA CADDESI TOMURCUK SOKAK. NO : 5

Description.Text:
Located right in the heart of Sultanahmet, down a narrow cobbled street behind the Blue Mosque, you will find this charming family-run hotel offering traditional Turkish hospitality with modern facilities.
Its location makes an idea base to explore the delights of this wonderful city and it is just a short walk from Topkapi Palace,Sultanahmet Camii, Hagia Sophia, the Grand Bazaar and within easy access to the general transport system. Suitable for both the leisure and business traveller.
The Tashkonak (which simply means Stone House) is a tastefully restored authentic Ottoman mansion. The hotel features 30 comfortable guest rooms located on three floors, each room is traditionally decorated with Ottoman-style furniture and fabrics. Colourful kilims cover the hardwood floors.
All rooms have mini-bar, cable TV, air-conditioner, central heating, free wireless internet access, safe deposit box, direct-dial telephone and private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and local toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony and there are triple and family rooms available.
The ever friendly and helpful staff will soon make you feel at home, creating a warm and relaxed atmosphere to make your stay in Istanbul a memorable one.
The Tashkonak has its own private and secluded terraced garden that offers you a cool, quiet place to rest after a hard day of sightseeing while you enjoy a refreshing glass of tea.
The roof-top terrace, with seating inside and outside, is where you will enjoy a traditional Turkish-style buffet breakfast, which includes a selection of olives, cheese, cold meats, salad, fruit, Turkish pastries, breads, honey, jams and eggs. The terrace has a magnificent panoramic view of the Marmara Sea and the Princes Islands, the Asian side of Istanbul, the old city and the Blue Mosque.
The hotel also provides dry cleaning, library, lobby and reception services.

Kucuk Ayasofya Cad., Tomurcuk Sok. No:5
SULTANAHMET, 34400 ISTANBUL
In old city center SULTANAHMET
0.4 miles Southeast from the centre of Istanbul.

Single - Room - Single room offers one twin bed equipped with air condition, wireless internet access, direct dial telephone, safe box, satellite TV with international channels, minibar, chair, fire alarm system, central heating, make up table with mirror, private bathroom with shower, and local toiletries such as shampoo, soap and hairdryer.
Double/Twin Room - Double/Twin Room offers one double bed or two twin beds for two adults. Double rooms are equipped with air condition, wireless internet access, direct dial telephone, satellite TV with international channels, minibar, safe box, chair, fire alarm system, central heating, make up table with mirror, private bathroom with shower and local toiletries such as shampoo, soap and hairdryer.
Triple - Room - Triple room offers one double bed and one twin bed or three twin beds equipped with air condition, wireless internet access, direct dial telephone, satellite TV with international channels, minibar, safe box, chair, fire alarm system, central heating, make up table with mirror, private bathroom with shower, local toiletries such as shampoo, soap and hairdryer.
Annex Studio Double on ground floor - Ground floor double in our Annex Tashkonak Suite Hotel, 30 metres away from our Main Tashkonak Hotel,Ground floor studio double room offers one king bed with a Kitchenette with Tea & Coffe facilities,( NO cooking facilities), Minibar, LCD TV, Air Conditioner, Central Heating, Free Wireless internet access, safe box, telephone, 24 hours hot water, private bathroom with bath and shower, 24 hours hot water, Hairdryer and local toiletries such as shampoo & soap.
